email_body: FROM DR.CHARLES JIDEOFORNNPC TOWERS IKOYILAGOS-NIGERIA   Hello,   Good day,  I am the Chairman of the Contract Award Committee, FederalMinistry of Petroleum Resources, Nigeria I am in search ofan agent to assist us in the transfer of (US$30,4M) THIRTYMILLION, FOUR HUNDRED THOUSAND UNITED STATES DOLLARS.($USD30,400,000) And subsequent investment in properties in yourcountry.You will be required to  (1) Assist in the transfer of the said sum (2) Advise on lucrative areas for investment (3) Assist us in purchase of properties. If you decide to render your service to us in this regard,20% of the total sum will be offerred to you. Pls, quicklyget back to me. thanks Respectfully. DR.CHARLES JIDEOFOR Chairman Contract Award Committee {CCAC}  -----------------------------------------------------------------------Deja de trabajar para beneficiar a tu jefe. TRABAJA PARA TI Y DESDE CASA.http://ad.doubleclick.net/clk;15727880;7829128;w?http://www.trabajaportucuenta.com/?pub=56
